1: strong left hook in the last minute from Ali
2: I have never seen someone with Frazier's body movement
Ali scoring to the head, Frazier to the body
3: idk how Ali is standing there on the ropes taking those body shots
4: Frazier pivots creating openings on the ropes
Ali doesn't have uppercut proper but flurry with the shovel hook
crowd chants Ali to start the round, chants Frazier to the end the round
6: strong lefts all round from Frazier, all coming from the dip
ref keeps pulling Ali's hand off Frazier's head but won't stop him
7: Ali moving more, keeping Frazier at the end of his punches
8: great action; Ali such a fluid puncher
I see this fight differently than the ringside announcers, who all have Ali ahead
9: not much the first minute or so but Frazier takes it to him from then on
10: whoever is calling for HBO is clearly partisan for Ali
13: Ali catches Frazier coming in straight up and lands strong lefts and rights
14: more than Ali smothering Frazier, Frazier smothers himself by getting too far inside when Ali not on the ropes
Ali won these past two rounds more definitively than other rounds in the fight
